attributes.action: Stop the government taking 40% of my pension pot when I die
attributes.additional_details: The money belongs to me and I should have the freedom to leave it to my children or whoever I wish.
attributes.background: I want the government not to proceed with their plan to take 40% of peoples pension when they die.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700306
